00005 #ifndef __IMAGE_H
00006 #define  __IMAGE_H
00007 
00008 #define X1 XL
00009 #define X2 XR
00010 #define Y1 YB
00011 #define Y2 YT
00012 
00013 
00014 typedef struct _EQUIVLIST
00015 {
00016 int               a,b;
00017 short             mtx[6];     /* transformation to go from sector a to sector b */
00018 struct _EQUIVLIST *next;
00019 }
00020 EQUIVLIST,*EQUIVLISTPTR;
00021 
00022 
00023 typedef struct _MIRROR
00024 {
00025 int        axisid,logaxisid; /* id of axis and its 2log, e.g. 128 and 7 */
00026 int            axis[4];       /* (2 x {X1,X2,Y1,Y2}) where axis passes through. */
00027 EQUIVLISTPTR   equivalence;   /* list of mirror-equivalent sectors. */
00028 short          mtx[6];        /* rotate/translate matrix for this mirror action */
00029 int            delta[2];      /* direction (points left/upper) of mirror axis */
00030 struct _MIRROR *next;
00031 }
00032 MIRROR,*MIRRORPTR;
00033 
00034 
00035 typedef struct _SECTORLIST
00036 {
00037 int            point[2];  /* a random point (double size) in the sector */
00038 int        sectorid;  /* id of sector (sector labeled with -sectorid) */
00039 struct _SECTORLIST *next;
00040 }
00041 SECTORLIST,*SECTORLISTPTR;
00042 
00043 
00044 typedef struct _POWERLINE
00045 {
00046    int        orient;         /* HOR or VER */
00047    int        row_or_column;  /* if orient = HOR then row number else column */
00048    char       *name;          /* "vss" or something like that (canonic) */
00049    int        layer;          /* layer in the range [0..numlayers-1] */
00050    struct _POWERLINE *next;   /* pointer to the next powerline structure */
00051 }
00052 POWERLINE, *POWERLINEPTR;     /* corresponds to PowerLine in image.seadif */
00053 
00054 
00055 typedef struct _IMAGEDESC
00056 {
00057 int           size[2];      /* #gridpoints in x- and y direction */
00058 int           overlap[2];   /* #gridpoints overlap in x and y direction */
00059 int       **stamp;      /* double sized image matrix, see mkmirrorlist() */
00060 int       numsector;    /* number of sectors */
00061 SECTORLISTPTR sectorlist;   /* list containing a point in each sector */
00062 int           numaxis;      /* number of mirror axis */
00063 MIRRORPTR     mirroraxis;   /* list of mirroraxis */
00064 int           numlayers;    /* number of routing layers */
00065 int           *routeorient; /* routing orientation of each layer (HOR or VER)*/
00066 int           *estransp;    /* estimated transparency for each layer */
00067 POWERLINEPTR  powerlines;   /* list of power lines that are image-intrinsic */
00068 }
00069 IMAGEDESC,*IMAGEDESCPTR;
00070

00072 #define NewMirror(p) ((p)=(MIRRORPTR)mnew(sizeof(MIRROR)))
00073 #define NewSectorlist(p) ((p)=(SECTORLISTPTR)mnew(sizeof(SECTORLIST)))
00074 #define NewEquivlist(p) ((p)=(EQUIVLISTPTR)mnew(sizeof(EQUIVLIST)))
00075 #define NewImagedesc(p) ((p)=(IMAGEDESCPTR)mnew(sizeof(IMAGEDESC)))
00076 #define FreeMirror(p) mfree((char **)(p),sizeof(MIRROR))
00077 #define FreeSectorlist(p) mfree((char **)(p),sizeof(SECTORLIST))
00078 #define FreeEquivlist(p) mfree((char **)(p),sizeof(EQUIVLIST))
00079 #define FreeImagedesc(p) mfree((char **)(p),sizeof(IMAGEDESC))
